heading: HB02133
0: AN ACT CREATING AS STREAMLINED NATIONAL IRRIGATION DEVELOPMENT PROGRAM, ABOLISHING THE IRRIGATION SERVICE FEES, RENAMING THE NATIONAL IRRIGATION ADMINISTRATION TO THE NATIONAL IRRIGATION DEVELOPMENT ADMINISTRATION, APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
short-title: Free Irrigation Reform And Restructuring Act
mother-bill statusstatus: Republic Act RA10969 enacted on 2018-02-02 Substituted by HB05670
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB02133
FULL TITLE : AN ACT CREATING AS STREAMLINED NATIONAL IRRIGATION DEVELOPMENT PROGRAM, ABOLISHING THE IRRIGATION SERVICE FEES, RENAMING THE NATIONAL IRRIGATION ADMINISTRATION TO THE NATIONAL IRRIGATION DEVELOPMENT ADMINISTRATION, APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
SHORT TITLE : Free Irrigation Reform And Restructuring Act
ABSTRACT : Aims to effectively develop and upgrade the construction of irrigation systems by reformulating and upgrading of irrigation methods through continued research, development and application of technological advancements in order to make irrigation sustainable, environment-friendly and cost effective.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : VILLAFUERTE, LUIS RAYMUND JR. F.
DATE FILED : 2016-07-28
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Batocabe (066 2017-02-06)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2016-11-22
          -A Technical Working Group was created to further study the NIA bills with Rep. NOEL VILLANUEVA as the Chairman, and co-chaired by Reps. Conrado Estrella and Cecilia Leonila Chavez.
      2. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2017-05-10
      3. Approved by the Committee on Appropriations on 2017-05-10
          -Substitute Bill to House Bill Nos. 37, 189, 294, 526, 558, 1053, 1197, 1887, 1943, 2133, 2150, 2247, 2251, 2812, 2857, 2880, 2902, 3013, 3119, 3151, 3302, 3505, 3589, 3595, 3853, 4056, 4162, 4170 and 4358 was approved with amendment.
MOTHER BILL: HB05670
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD ON 2016-08-08
